mapper.select: SELECT pd.payment_detail_number AS paymentDetailNumber, pd.product_count AS productCount, pd.product_price AS productPrice, pd.payment_detail_status AS paymentDetailStatus, pd.product_number AS productNumber, p.payment_number AS paymentNumber, pr.product_name AS productName FROM payment_detail pd INNER JOIN payment p ON pd.payment_number = p.payment_number INNER JOIN product pr ON pd.product_number = pr.product_number -- Use the correct column name here ORDER BY pd.payment_detail_number DESC LIMIT 4;
